thread.title: Shanghai, Hong Kong stocks tumble
thread.title_full: Shanghai, Hong Kong stocks tumble | Business Spectator

author: AFP
title: Shanghai, Hong Kong stocks tumble
text:
Shares in Hong Kong and Shanghai have retreated after a two-day rally, following mixed inflation data out of China while investors are also fretting over the US Federal Reserve's plans for raising interest rates.
In Hong Kong, the Hang Seng Index on Thursday slipped 2.57 per cent, or 568.81 points, to close at 21,562.5.
Shanghai's benchmark composite index lost 1.39 per cent, or 45.20 points, to end at 3,197.89.
The Shenzhen Composite Index, which tracks stocks on China's second exchange, fell 1.58 per cent, or 28.46 points, to 1,770.38.
